body.p: Enclosed please find a petion requesting your Excellancy to interpose you executive clemency in the facts therein set forth. I would call your attention to the statements of the Honble Judge Johnson in Confirmation thereof. Hoping that I may the recipient of the favor I ask I subscribe myself

To his Excellancy
Thos E Bramblette
Governor of Kentucky
